content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":1,"originalJapaneseLine":"エロヤックALVと少し仲良くなり、","translatedEnglishLine":"You became a little friendly with Ero Yakk ALV,"},{"lineNumber":2,"originalJapaneseLine":"落語を聞かせてもらった。","translatedEnglishLine":"and were told some rakugo stories."},{"lineNumber":3,"originalJapaneseLine":"○○月××日――","translatedEnglishLine":"XX Month XX Day――"},{"lineNumber":4,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは実家のある村に帰ってきていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"You had returned to the village where your family home is."},{"lineNumber":5,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほーん、ここが＜エール＞の故郷かぁー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, so this is <Eiru>'s hometown.\""},{"lineNumber":6,"originalJapaneseLine":"「普通の村だねえ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's just an ordinary village.\""},{"lineNumber":7,"originalJapaneseLine":"「クルックーさん、ここで生活していたんだぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Krukku-san lived here, huh.\""},{"lineNumber":8,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの人はやることが謎というか、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That person is mysterious in what they do,"},{"lineNumber":9,"originalJapaneseLine":"　秘密主義というか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"  or I guess secretive...\""},{"lineNumber":10,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とりあえず相棒の家に行ってみようぜ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"For now, let's go visit my partner's house!"},{"lineNumber":11,"originalJapaneseLine":"　母ちゃんにも挨拶しておきたいしよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"  I also want to greet your mom!\""},{"lineNumber":12,"originalJapaneseLine":"意気揚々と村の中を進み、","translatedEnglishLine":"You went through the village in high spirits,"},{"lineNumber":13,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは生まれ育った家についた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and arrived at the house where you were born and raised."},{"lineNumber":14,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あん？　鍵がかかってんな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? It's locked?\""},{"lineNumber":15,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ドアに貼り紙があるぜ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, there's a note stuck to the door.\""},{"lineNumber":16,"originalJapaneseLine":"　えーと、なになに？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let's see, what does it say?\""},{"lineNumber":17,"originalJapaneseLine":"「＜エール＞。お帰りなさい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"<Eiru>. Welcome back.\""},{"lineNumber":18,"originalJapaneseLine":"「突然ですが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Suddenly,"},{"lineNumber":19,"originalJapaneseLine":"　家の中には入れないようにしています」","translatedEnglishLine":"  you are not allowed to enter the house.\""},{"lineNumber":20,"originalJapaneseLine":"「鍵なら村の裏手にある山、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The key is in the mountain behind the village,"},{"lineNumber":21,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その中の迷宮にありますよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"  inside the labyrinth there.\""},{"lineNumber":22,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だってさ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's what it says..."},{"lineNumber":23,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうする？」","translatedEnglishLine":"  What will you do?\""},{"lineNumber":24,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well..."},{"lineNumber":25,"originalJapaneseLine":"　このまま帰るってのも癪だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"  It would be annoying to just go back like this."},{"lineNumber":26,"originalJapaneseLine":"　行くか」","translatedEnglishLine":"  Let's go.\""},{"lineNumber":27,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなた達は貼り紙の指示に従って、","translatedEnglishLine":"You decided to follow the instructions on the note,"},{"lineNumber":28,"originalJapaneseLine":"進んでみることにした。","translatedEnglishLine":"and went forward."},{"lineNumber":29,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どこなんだ、ここはー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Where is this place!?\""},{"lineNumber":30,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい！　次は西に行けっつってんぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey! The next direction is west!\""},{"lineNumber":31,"originalJapaneseLine":"「村の地下に更に迷宮が！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Another labyrinth under the village!?\""},{"lineNumber":32,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わー、前が見えないー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wow, I can't see ahead!\""},{"lineNumber":33,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなた達の家の鍵を取るまでの冒険は","translatedEnglishLine":"The adventure to get your house key"},{"lineNumber":34,"originalJapaneseLine":"困難を極め、時刻も夕暮れになっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"was extremely difficult, and the time had turned to dusk."},{"lineNumber":35,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……はあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah... hah...\""},{"lineNumber":36,"originalJapaneseLine":"「つ、ついにゴールか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"F-fi­nally, the goal...\""},{"lineNumber":37,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お馴染みの貼り紙が……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There's the familiar note...\""},{"lineNumber":38,"originalJapaneseLine":"　えーと、なになに？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh, what does it say?\""},{"lineNumber":39,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よくぞここまで辿り着きましたね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You have successfully made it this far."},{"lineNumber":40,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おめでとうございます」","translatedEnglishLine":"Congratulations.\""},{"lineNumber":41,"originalJapaneseLine":"「約束の宝……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The promised treasure..."},{"lineNumber":42,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それはあなたの隣にありますよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"is right beside you.\""},{"lineNumber":43,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたの隣には長田君やザンス達がいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Next to you were Nagata-kun and Zansu and the others."},{"lineNumber":44,"originalJapaneseLine":"「宝とは、ここまで共に苦難を乗り越えた、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The treasure is the irreplaceable friends"},{"lineNumber":45,"originalJapaneseLine":"　かけがえのない仲間達のことだったのです。","translatedEnglishLine":"who have overcome hardship together to this point."},{"lineNumber":46,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ばばーん」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ta-da!\""},{"lineNumber":47,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――という冗談は置いておいて」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"--Jokes aside,"},{"lineNumber":48,"originalJapaneseLine":"「冒険の途中で","translatedEnglishLine":"On your journey,"},{"lineNumber":49,"originalJapaneseLine":"　帰ってこようとは甘いですね、＜エール＞」","translatedEnglishLine":"you think you can come back halfway through? That's naive, <Eiru>.\""},{"lineNumber":50,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちゃんと、全てを終わらせてから","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Make sure you finish everything properly"},{"lineNumber":51,"originalJapaneseLine":"　帰ってきなさい」","translatedEnglishLine":"before you come back.\""},{"lineNumber":52,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それでは、行ってらっしゃい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, take care.\""},{"lineNumber":53,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前のかーちゃん、変な奴だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Your mom's a weird one.\""},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたの母は変な人だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Your mother was a strange person."},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"○○月××日――","translatedEnglishLine":"XX Month XX Day――"},{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"△△月□□日――","translatedEnglishLine":"YY Month ZZ Day――"},{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"××月△△日――","translatedEnglishLine":"ZZ Month YY Day――"},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エロヤックALVと少し仲良くなり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You became a little friendly with Ero Yakk ALV,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 落語を聞かせてもらった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and were told some rakugo stories.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは実家のある村に帰ってきていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You had returned to the village where your family home is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほーん、ここが＜エール＞の故郷かぁー」
「普通の村だねえ」
「クルックーさん、ここで生活していたんだぁ」
「あの人はやることが謎というか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That person is mysterious in what they do,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 秘密主義というか……」
「とりあえず相棒の家に行ってみようぜ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For now, let's go visit my partner's house!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 母ちゃんにも挨拶しておきたいしよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I also want to greet your mom!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意気揚々と村の中を進み、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You went through the village in high spirits,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは生まれ育った家についた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and arrived at the house where you were born and raised.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん？　鍵がかかってんな？」
「あ、ドアに貼り紙があるぜ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, there's a note stuck to the door."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーと、なになに？」
「＜エール＞。お帰りなさい」
「突然ですが、
家の中には入れないようにしています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you are not allowed to enter the house."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「鍵なら村の裏手にある山、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The key is in the mountain behind the village,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その中の迷宮にありますよ」
「だってさ……
どうする？」
このまま帰るってのも癪だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It would be annoying to just go back like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 行くか」
あなた達は貼り紙の指示に従って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You decided to follow the instructions on the note,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 進んでみることにした。
「どこなんだ、ここはー！？」
「おい！　次は西に行けっつってんぞ！」
「村の地下に更に迷宮が！？」
「わー、前が見えないー！」
あなた達の家の鍵を取るまでの冒険は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The adventure to get your house key

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 困難を極め、時刻も夕暮れになっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was extremely difficult, and the time had turned to dusk.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……はあ……」
「つ、ついにゴールか……」
「お馴染みの貼り紙が……
えーと、なになに？」
「よくぞここまで辿り着きましたね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You have successfully made it this far.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おめでとうございます」
「約束の宝……
それはあなたの隣にありますよ」
あなたの隣には長田君やザンス達がいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Next to you were Nagata-kun and Zansu and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「宝とは、ここまで共に苦難を乗り越えた、
かけがえのない仲間達のことだったのです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: who have overcome hardship together to this point.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばばーん」
「――という冗談は置いておいて」
「冒険の途中で
帰ってこようとは甘いですね、＜エール＞」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you think you can come back halfway through? That's naive, <Eiru>."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちゃんと、全てを終わらせてから
帰ってきなさい」
「それでは、行ってらっしゃい」
「お前のかーちゃん、変な奴だな」
あなたの母は変な人だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your mother was a strange person.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The key is in the mountain behind the village,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その中の迷宮にありますよ」
「だってさ……
どうする？」
このまま帰るってのも癪だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It would be annoying to just go back like this.

あなた達は貼り紙の指示に従って、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The adventure to get your house key

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 困難を極め、時刻も夕暮れになっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was extremely difficult, and the time had turned to dusk.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……はあ……」

それはあなたの隣にありますよ」

かけがえのない仲間達のことだったのです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: who have overcome hardship together to this point.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばばーん」
「――という冗談は置いておいて」
「冒険の途中で
帰ってこようとは甘いですね、＜エール＞」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you think you can come back halfway through? That's naive, <Eiru>."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちゃんと、全てを終わらせてから
帰ってきなさい」
「それでは、行ってらっしゃい」
「お前のかーちゃん、変な奴だな」
あなたの母は変な人だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your mother was a strange person.
